abstract: CVC Capital Partners has made the only bid for Anheuser-Busch InBev‘s Central and Eastern European assets, people familiar with the matter told Reuters.
snippet: CVC Capital Partners has made the only bid for Anheuser-Busch InBev‘s Central and Eastern European assets, people familiar with the matter told Reuters.
lead_paragraph: CVC Capital Partners has made the only bid for Anheuser-Busch InBev‘s Central and Eastern European assets, Reuters reported, citing people familiar with the matter.

headline.main: CVC Said to Submit Sole Bid for AB InBev Assets
